text: Petro Zyma is a government official who until the Russian annexation of Crimea served as a chief of the Security Service of Ukraine in Sevastopol (2012-2014)Petro Zyma at MyrotvoretsNalyvaichenko considers Aksyonov and Zyma involved in mass killings in Kyiv (Наливайченко вважає Аксьонова та Зиму причетними до масових вбивств в Києві). Espreso TV. 12 March 2014Turchynov fired the chief of SBU in Sevastopol (Турчинов зняв керівника СБУ в Севастополі). Ukrayinska Pravda. 3 March 2014 and who defected to the Russian Federation becoming the Federal Security Service official. Beside being accused in a state treason, Zyma is under suspicion to be involved in killing of civilians during the Euromaidan events in February 2014. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bakhmut Category:Security Service of Ukraine officers Category:Fugitives wanted by Ukraine Category:Ukrainian defectors Category:People of the annexation of Crimea by the Russian Federation Category:Pro-Russian people of the 2014 pro- Russian unrest in Ukraine
title: Petro Zyma
